SecureTea

Is your system secure ?
Tell Me More

About

SecureTea Secure your system.

  • What is OWASP SecureTea project

    The OWASP SecureTea Project is an application designed to help secure a person's laptop

  • Functioning

    With the help of IOT (Internet of Things) notify users (via various communication mechanisms), whenever someone accesses their computer / server. This application uses the touchpad/mouse/wireless mouse to determine activity and is developed in Python and tested on various machines (Linux, Mac & Windows).

  • Objective

    To alert the user via various communication mechanism, whenever The Computer / Server had been accessed by someone / attacker. And also it can be used to monitor your system & SecureTea firewall as Defense.

How it works.. ?

Pointer - Movements

Keep track of the movement of the mouse or touchpad

Functioning

Detect who accesses your device(laptop or server other iot device) with mouse or touchpad installed

Sends Warning

Send warning messages on Twitter/Twilio-SMS/Slack/Telegram. More features on the way.

Installation

PyPi

You can install SecureTea from PyPi package manager

pip install securetea

Please make sure all dependencies are installed if this fails.

Github

Installing from GitHub involves the following steps:

git clone https://github.com/OWASP/SecureTea-Project.git

Install SecureTea package

sudo python setup.py install

Install python dependencies

pip install -r requirements.txt

Zip

Download the Zip

Unzip using: unzip master.zip

Navigate into the project directory

cd SecureTea-Project

Install SecureTea package

sudo python setup.py install

SecureTea

THE OWASP SECURETEA PROJECT
IS AN APPLICATION DESIGNED TO
HELP SECURE A PERSON’S LAPTOP

Learn More

About
OWASP SecureTea

The OWASP SecureTea Project is an application designed to help secure a person's laptop or computer / server with IoT (Internet Of Things) and notify users (via various communication mechanisms), whenever someone accesses their computer / server. This application uses the touchpad/mouse/wireless mouse to determine activity and is developed in Python and tested on various machines (Linux, Mac & Windows).

Github

Installing from GitHub involves the following steps:

git clone https://github.com/OWASP/SecureTea-Project.git

Install SecureTea package

sudo python setup.py install

Install python dependencies

pip install -r requirements.txt

PyPi

You can install SecureTea from PyPi package manager.

pip install securetea

Please make sure all dependencies are installed if this fails.
